net.kuujo.vertigo.io

Interface OutputCollector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable<OutputCollector>, IOCollector<OutputCollector>, Openable<OutputCollector>

    public interface OutputCollector
extends IOCollector<OutputCollector>
    Interface for sending messages on output ports.

    The output collector exposes a simple interface to OutputPort instances through which messages can be sent.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OutputPort port(String name)
      Returns an output port.
      Collection<OutputPort> ports()
      Returns a collection of output ports.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.kuujo.vertigo.io.Openable

        open, open

      • Methods inherited from interface net.kuujo.vertigo.io.Closeable

    • Method Detail

      • ports

        Collection<OutputPort> ports()
        Returns a collection of output ports.
        Returns:
        A collection of output ports.

      • port

        OutputPort port(String name)
        Returns an output port.

        If the port doesn't already exist then the input collector will lazily create the port. Ports can be referenced prior to the output event starting up, and once the output starts ports will be properly configured.

        Specified by:
        port in interface IOCollector<OutputCollector>
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the port to load.
        Returns:
        An output port.
